line.text: I never saw that you did painting need
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And therefore to your fair no painting set
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I found (or thought I found) you did exceed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That barren tender of a poet debt
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And therefore have I slept in your report
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That you your self being extant well might show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How far a modern quill doth come too short
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Speaking of worth what worth in you doth grow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This silence for my sin you did impute
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which shall be most my glory being dumb
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For I impair not beauty being mute
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When others would give life and bring a tomb
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: There lives more life in one of your fair eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than both your poets can in praise devise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
